title: Theta Boosts EdgeCloud With DeepSeek-R1 In AI Pivot
body: Theta says it is integrating DeepSeek‚Äôs R1 AI model into its EdgeCloud platform. The move targets improving scalability, reducing latency, enhancing security, and ensuring cost efficiency. This development will ultimately advance Theta‚Äôs AI processing capabilities. A Strategic Fusion between AI and Blockchain With this integration, Theta has better infrastructure to grow its AI training and computational demands. According to experts‚Äô opinions, integration is vital for the broader AI and blockchain space. AI developers can rely on EdgeCloud‚Äôs decentralized platform to train their AI models. This is crucial given the volume of data required to train AI and guarantee the optimum performance of the project. Additionally, EdgeCloud integration helps provide a bridge between AI and decentralized infrastructure. Another critical advantage is that blockchain technology provides enhanced security for AI processes while ensuring data integrity. This suggests that Theta is investing in the future growth of AI via decentralized computing. This development places Theta in a key role as the AI blockchain revolution gains momentum. Analysts maintain that if properly harnessed, Theta might emerge as a leader in the convergence of AI and blockchain. DeepSeek-R1‚Äôs Market Disruption For context, DeepSeek-R1 is an AI model designed to provide cost-efficient scalable AI processing. The groundbreaking technology China‚Äôs AI lab DeepSeek developed disrupted the broader financial market. DeepSeek massively impacted the crypto market as total capitalization dipped by a significant 6.4% . This disruption came from the now controversial claim that the DeepSeek R1 was built on a lean budget of $6 million. Experts maintain that DeepSeek has opened a new chapter in AI modeling history despite the controversial claim. They believe developers would evolve more cost-effective ways of training models and building AI technology. Fraudulent DeepSeek Tokens Emerge In the crypto space, fraudsters took advantage of the hype around DeepSeek to launch scam tokens. BlockAid, a cyber-security firm, identified at least 75 scam tokens that claimed association with DeepSeek . These malicious actors even faked the company‚Äôs official website with plans to dispossess users of their funds. This development prompted DeepSeek to issue a critical warning to alert users. With the recent development of Theta, many are keenly observing how this will impact the broader ecosystem. title: Is This New Altcoin Poised to Become the Next DeFi Market Leader?
body: Mutuum Finance is a new project in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space that‚Äôs catching the attention of investors and crypto enthusiasts. This lending platform offers features like secure borrowing and supplying of crypto assets, aiming to make DeFi more accessible and efficient. With its presale underway and a clear plan for future growth, many are wondering if Mutuum Finance could become a top player in the DeFi market. Mutuum Finance: A New DeFi Lending Protocol Mutuum Finance is a decentralized lending protocol that allows users to supply or borrow crypto assets securely. Built with a focus on flexibility and transparency, the platform provides efficient tools for managing crypto assets while ensuring a user-friendly experience. The protocol features two main markets: Peer-to-Contract (P2C) and Peer-to-Peer (P2P). In the P2C market, automated smart contracts securely handle transactions, providing an efficient way to supply or borrow assets. The P2P market, in contrast, facilitates direct user-to-user interactions, allowing personalized agreements while maintaining security through the platform‚Äôs audited smart contracts. Additionally, the P2P market ensures the protocol remains as safe as possible by preventing interactions or the inclusion of coins that fail to meet high-security standards, such as centralized tokens, exploit-prone tokens, or tokens without minting limits. The Mutuum Finance team plans to implement a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO), enabling community-driven governance. With the DAO in place, token holders will have a say in key decisions, such as platform updates and future developments. This approach promotes transparency and ensures that the project evolves in line with the community‚Äôs interests. To enhance the platform‚Äôs ecosystem, the team is also developing a fully collateralized stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar. This stablecoin will provide users with a stable and reliable medium for transactions, further strengthening the platform‚Äôs utility and trustworthiness. For suppliers, investing in liquidity pools can generate passive income. For example, a $10,000 USDT contribution at a 7% APY could yield $700 annually, depending on demand. Borrowers can use assets like ETH as collateral to access funds without selling their holdings, providing financial flexibility. Mutuum Finance is currently in its first presale stage, offering tokens at their lowest price of $0.01. This initial stage provides investors with a unique chance to secure tokens before the price increases in subsequent stages. With a launch price set at $0.06, early investors stand to see a 1700% return on their investments by the token‚Äôs release. This attractive entry point is generating significant demand, creating a sense of urgency among investors eager to capitalize on this promising opportunity. Crypto experts anticipate that the first presale stage will sell out quickly due to the low entry price, creating strong demand among investors. Adding to the momentum, the team plans to launch a beta version of the platform at the same time as the token‚Äôs release. This strategic move is expected to increase demand for MUTM and drive up its price post-launch, making now an opportune time to invest. Mutuum Finance has announced an exciting $100,000 giveaway aimed at rewarding its early supporters and fostering community engagement. The total prize pool will be divided among 10 winners, with each receiving $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens. To participate, users need to follow simple steps outlined on the official Mutuum Finance website, such as engaging with the project‚Äôs social media channels and completing specific tasks. Mutuum Finance is quickly gaining recognition as a promising new player in the DeFi market. With its focus on secure and flexible lending through P2C and P2P markets, along with plans for a DAO and a fully collateralized stablecoin, the platform is well-positioned for sustainable growth. The ongoing presale offers early investors an opportunity to secure substantial returns, with a projected 2700% increase by launch. With features and strategic plans, Mutuum Finance could be a significant contender in the DeFi space by 2025. title: Ripple (XRP) Price Forecast: XRP Deposits on Binance Drops $1.3B to Hit 40-Day Low ‚Äì Is It Bullish?
body: Ripple (XRP) price fell as low as $2.60 on Sunday February 2, down 17% in 3 consecutive losing days, on-chain data suggests whale accumulation and long-term approach from retail traders. Will XRP price stage an early rebound as US Canada trade war flares. XRP Price Stabilizes Above $2.60 as Trump Tariff War Triggers Risk-Off Sentiment Ripple (XRP) has been on a downtrend for the past three days, with multiple bearish catalysts, including escalating trade tensions between the US and Canada. On February 2, XRP fell as low as $2.60, marking a 17% decline from its opening price of $3.10 on January 29. The recent market turmoil was triggered by the announcement of new tariffs, as former President Donald Trump accused Canada of unfair trade practices and imposed new restrictions on key exports. In response, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced retaliatory measures, igniting fears of a prolonged economic standoff. The geopolitical uncertainty has sent shockwaves through global markets. Key US Stock indices tumbled, while the crypto market followed suit, with Bitcoin (BTC) plunging to $96,000 . Meanwhile, gold gained traction as investors fled to safe-haven assets, highlighting the classic risk-off sentiment seen during times of geopolitical instability. Ripple (XRP) Price Action, Feb 2, 2025 | Source: Coingecko Despite the losses, Ripple price action showed relative resilience compared to other mega-cap altcoins. While XRP posted a 10% daily drop, some of last week‚Äôs top gainers like SUI and Polkadot suffered even steeper declines, exceeding 15% in the same period. This performance suggests that XRP might attract strategic buyers looking to enter the market at a discount amid the uncertainty. 490 Million XRP Transferred from Binance, Hinting at Resilient Long-Term Outlook on ETFs While XRP‚Äôs price has been under pressure, on-chain data points to a potentially bullish underlying trend. A significant metric to assess investor sentiment is the total XRP reserves on Binance. CryptoQuant‚Äôs data reveals that XRP deposits on Binance have dropped to a 40-day low, decreasing from 3.04 billion XRP on January 16 to 2.55 billion XRP as of February 2. This means 490 million XRP coins have exited Binance in just over two weeks. This decline in exchange reserves suggests that long-term investors and whales are accumulating XRP and moving their holdings into cold storage. Binance processes over 40% of the global retail crypto market, making this metric particularly relevant in gauging investor sentiment. Ripple (XRP) Price vs. Exchange Reserves (Binance) | Source: CryptoQuant Another interpretation of this trend is that institutional players may be proactively accumulating XRP in anticipation of regulatory clarity surrounding exchange-traded funds (ETFs). Bloomberg analysts recently hinted that a Litecoin ETF may be approved first, raising expectations that other altcoins, such as XRP, could follow. Institutional investors often acquire assets in advance of major regulatory developments, suggesting that the recent outflows could be linked to potential ETF-related holdings. Valued at the current price, the 490 million XRP removed from Binance translates to approximately $1.3 billion. This supply reduction could act as a buffer against further downward price action, potentially stabilizing XRP at $2.60 while other cryptocurrencies experience more extreme losses. In conclusion, despite XRP‚Äôs recent decline, the asset appears to be holding up better than some of its peers. Whale accumulation, declining exchange reserves, and the ETF narrative could provide strong tailwinds for XRP‚Äôs price action once broader market conditions stabilize. XRP Price Forecast: $3 rebound hopes hinges on $2.60 support XRP price forecast charts shows the Ripple-backed coin stabilized above the critical $2.60 support level, and despite the recent sell-off, the broader technical structure suggests a potential rebound toward $3.00 if key indicators align. The Elliott Wave structure on the daily chart signals that XRP recently completed its fifth wave up, followed by a sharp corrective move, a typical market cycle behavior. The Fibonacci retracement levels highlight a key support zone around $2.5990, coinciding with the 0.618 retracement level, which historically acts as a strong reversal point for bullish recoveries. If XRP maintains this level, buyers could regain confidence, fueling a potential move toward the 0.382 ($2.8439) or even $3.0562 resistance. XRP price forecast | Feb 2, 2025 The MACD indicator, however, presents a more cautious outlook, with the signal line crossing below the MACD line, confirming weakening bullish momentum. If selling pressure persists and XRP loses the $2.60 support, a deeper retracement toward $2.50 remains likely. However, if buyers absorb the current supply and the MACD histogram begins to show diminishing red bars, it could confirm bottoming out, positioning XRP for a relief rally The post Ripple (XRP) Price Forecast: XRP Deposits on Binance Drops $1.3B to Hit 40-Day Low ‚Äì Is It Bullish? appeared first on CoinGape .

Enter XYZverse, the first-ever meme coin ecosystem that fuses the competitive fire of sports with the electrifying energy of memes ‚Äî a digital battlefield where sports lovers, gamers, and crypto warriors unite for legendary gains. The project‚Äôs tokenomics ensure a stable, sustainable trajectory, with: 15% allocated to liquidity, strengthening its foundation. 10% dedicated to community rewards, fueling engagement through bonuses and airdrops. A deflationary burn of 17.13%, steadily reducing supply and amplifying long-term value. XYZverse isn‚Äôt playing small ‚Äî it‚Äôs building bridges between sports fandom and crypto mass adoption. With plans to collaborate with high-profile athletes, XYZ will soon dominate both the meme coin and sports entertainment landscapes. These game-changing partnerships will boost visibility, credibility, and demand, ensuring that XYZ becomes the gold standard of sports-driven meme coins. XYZverse is a movement and its community is ready to storm the charts. With a winning formula of hype, utility, and long-term vision, XYZ is set to redefine what a meme coin can achieve. Interested investors can be part of XYZVerse via presale. Jupiter Jupiter has established itself as a leading decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator within the Solana ecosystem, ensuring users access the best token swap rates by pulling liquidity from multiple pools. This not only enhances trading efficiency but also reduces costs for users. Beyond swaps, Jupiter has expanded its services, introducing perpetual futures, decentralized stablecoin solutions, and the innovative LFG launchpad ‚Äî an accelerator designed to support emerging Solana projects. One of Jupiter‚Äôs biggest contributions to DeFi is addressing price discrepancies across various platforms. Since liquidity pools on different exchanges can create pricing variations, Jupiter‚Äôs aggregation model guarantees users the most competitive rates. As the DeFi sector evolves, platforms like Jupiter ‚Äî offering tangible utility and solving real market inefficiencies ‚Äî stand out as compelling opportunities compared to projects with less concrete use cases. It assigns unique IDs and sensors to physical products, allowing companies to track goods in real time. This is especially helpful in industries like food, fashion, and automotive. Founded by Sunny Lu, a former executive at Louis Vuitton China, VeChain moved from Ethereum to its own blockchain, VeChainThor, in 2018. This shift introduced a dual-token system with VET for value transfer and VeThor token for transaction fees. VeChain‚Äôs technology has the potential to change how businesses track and verify products. Its partnerships with big names like Walmart China and BMW show its real-world applications. body: A cryptocurrency trader has realized a profit of nearly $16 million by capitalizing on Ether‚Äôs (ETH) recent price decline. The trader established a 50x leveraged short position when ETH was valued at $3,388, with a liquidation threshold set at $4,645, according to data from Hypurrscan. In addition to the unrealized profit, the trader accrued approximately $2.3 million in funding fees from the leveraged position. While leveraged trading can amplify potential gains, it also significantly increases the risk of substantial losses. A case in point is a pseudonymous trader who, in January 2024, lost over $161,000 in a single trade due to liquidation on a leveraged position, underscoring the inherent risks associated with such strategies. As of February 2, Ether‚Äôs price had declined by more than 4% over a 24-hour period, trading at $3,107. The cryptocurrency reached a daily low of $3,068 but managed to stay above the critical $3,000 psychological threshold, as reported by Cointelegraph Markets Pro. To reverse its six-week downward trend, Ethereum may need to bolster fundamental blockchain activity. Aurelie Barthere, principal research analyst at Nansen, noted, ‚ÄúOther layer-1s are catching up with Ethereum regarding apps, use cases, fees and amount staked.‚Äù Barthere suggested that increased collaboration with both private and public sector entities, especially in the United States amid recent regulatory developments favoring blockchain and cryptocurrency, could be beneficial for Ethereum. For a potential reversal toward the $4,000 mark, Ether would need to reclaim the $3,400 level, according to crypto trader Cas Abb√©. However, significant resistance is anticipated at $3,240. Surpassing this level could trigger over $1 billion in cumulative leveraged short liquidations, as indicated by data from CoinGlass. These developments highlight the volatile nature of cryptocurrency markets and the substantial risks and rewards associated with leveraged trading strategies.

Astra: Embracing Quantum-Resistant Security Astra has positioned itself as a trailblazer with its focus on quantum-resistant security protocols. In a world where quantum computing threatens traditional blockchain cryptography, Astra‚Äôs foresight has set it apart. This innovation promises faster transaction speeds while maintaining high security and decentralization. The market response to Astra‚Äôs advancements has been overwhelmingly positive. Trading activity has surged, and its expanding ecosystem has attracted attention from developers seeking quantum-proof solutions. Analysts predict that as quantum computing advances, Astra‚Äôs relevance will only grow, making it a hot pick for investors focused on Layer 1 innovation. Ethereum: The Smart Contract Pioneer Ethereum, introduced in 2015, revolutionized the blockchain space by enabling smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps). Its transition to Ethereum 2.0, which involves shifting from a Proof-of-Work (PoW) to a Proof-of-Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, aims to improve scalability, security, and energy efficiency. Over the years, Ethereum has cultivated a vast developer community, contributing to a rich ecosystem of dApps and protocols. Its ERC-20 and ERC-721 token standards have become the industry norm for fungible and non-fungible tokens, respectively. For investors seeking exposure to a platform with a proven track record and continuous innovation, Ethereum remains a compelling choice. Its established infrastructure and ongoing upgrades suggest potential for sustained growth and adoption. Conclusion: Navigating the Future of Crypto Investments Qubetics , with its innovative QubeQode IDE and successful presale, offers a fresh perspective in the crypto space. Astra provides a forward-thinking approach to blockchain security, addressing future challenges with quantum-resistant protocols. Ethereum continues to lead with its robust platform, supporting a vast array of decentralized applications. title: Japanese Finance Minster: Tokyo Will Review Crypto Tax System ‚Äòby June‚Äô
body: The Japanese Finance Minster Katsunobu Kato has promised Tokyo will review the nation‚Äôs controversial and much-maligned crypto tax laws by the end of June this year. Per the House of Representatives‚Äô official website and a report from the Japanese-language media outlet Iolite , Kato made the comments at a plenary session of the House of Representatives on the 31st. Japanese Finance Minister: Regulators Readying Crypto Tax Review Kato was responding to a question from the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) lawmaker Akihisa Shiozaki, the head of the party‚Äôs Web3 Digital Society Promotion office. LDP lawmaker Akihisa Shiozaki with a Thai diplomat in October 2023. (Source: MFA of Thailand/X) Kato explained that the Financial Service Agency (FSA) will issue a review ‚Äúbased on the ruling party [LDP]‚Äôs tax system proposals.‚Äù He added that the review would include recommendations on ‚Äúnecessary legislative amendments.‚Äù Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba also waded into the discussion by ‚Äúexpressing his belief that cryptoassets‚Äù would ‚Äúcontribute to solving Japan‚Äôs social problems and improving productivity.‚Äù ‚ÄúThe healthy development of web3 ‚Äì including cryptoassets ‚Äì is extremely important.‚Äù Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba Ishiba added that it was ‚Äúimportant‚Äù for the government to ‚Äúensure user protection‚Äù and ‚Äúimprove the environment‚Äù of the domestic crypto market. Japan intends to closely monitor the impact on its currency of US President Donald Trump‚Äôs new tariffs and is worried about the international fallout from the trade imposts, Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato said. https://t.co/qxpf4okSOo ‚Äî Bloomberg (@business) February 2, 2025 Regulator‚Äôs Report Key The minister said the FSA will also outline its proposed changes to the nation‚Äôs tax authorities. This, Kato said, will ensure any necessary changes are ‚Äúput in place‚Äù before the new rules roll out. Kato also suggested that Tokyo is ready to change its legal definition of cryptoassets. Existing Japanese law defines crypto as a type of ‚Äúpayment instrument.‚Äù But the minister said that ‚Äúin reality‚Äù coins like Bitcoin (BTC) are ‚Äúmainly traded for investment purposes.‚Äù He added that the FSA has ‚Äúindicated an intention‚Äù to ‚Äútake in a wide range of opinions‚Äù before making an official recommendation ‚Äúon the appropriateness of‚Äù crypto‚Äôs current ‚Äúlegal status.‚Äù Since the FSA began policing the Japanese crypto market in earnest in 2017, the agency has had the last word on all related regulations. The LDP, which has been in power on an almost uninterrupted basis since the 1950s, has formulated basic crypto policy. But it is the FSA that has formulated regulations and legal amendments. Thus far, all of the FSA‚Äôs proposals and requests made to parliament on the matter have been adopted without delay. Trading volumes on the Japanese crypto exchange platform Coincheck over the past 12 months. (Source: CoinGecko) PM‚Äôs Caution Ishiba‚Äôs predecessor Fumio Kishida took a relatively progressive stance on crypto regulation. Ishiba, however, has been more cautious on the matter of tax reform . But he has also made a number of more conciliatory comments about crypto and blockchain. Shiozaki‚Äôs department has called for faster action, claiming late last year that its proposal to reform crypto tax was of ‚Äúurgent‚Äù importance. Japanese tax laws require crypto traders to report their profits on their yearly income tax returns. This runs in contrast to many other countries, which impose flat capital gains levies on traders (at rates of around 20%). Japanese traders must file their crypto trading profits on annual tax returns as ‚Äúother income.‚Äù This means that the wealthiest crypto traders in Japan must hand over up to 55% of their trading profits to the Treasury. This, they claim, has stifled growth in the web3 and crypto sectors. The FSA, meanwhile, is also reportedly considering making an amendment to the Payment Services Act. This measure could see crypto included as an asset class under the terms of the Financial Instruments and Exchange Act. If true, this would appear to indicate that the FSA and the Japanese Finance Minster now share a common stance on reform. title: 4 Best Long-Term Cryptos in 2025: BlockDAG, Dogecoin, Solana & Chainlink‚Äî Top Picks for Huge ROI!
body: Crypto fans looking for high-growth assets in 2025 have various choices, but not all options hold the same potential. The project is focused on expanding its network and forming key connections that will support wider usage. What truly sets BlockDAG apart in the best long-term cryptos for 2025 is its powerful processing structure. Using a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) setup, it allows multiple transactions at once without slowing down the system. This makes it highly suitable for areas like decentralized finance, gaming, and digital collectibles, where quick transactions and low costs are crucial. Speed plays a vital role in digital currency, and BlockDAG delivers in this aspect. Originally made for fun, DOGE has grown into a widely accepted digital currency, benefiting from its low fees, high liquidity, and frequent use for payments. However, meme coins often thrive on popularity, and as digital currency markets shift, Dogecoin remains a relevant choice for those seeking speculative plays in 2025. 3. Solana: A Fast Network with Developer Appeal Solana (SOL) has proven itself as one of the quickest processing networks, handling transactions at high speed and low cost. Its easy-to-use system has made it a go-to platform for decentralized finance, NFTs, and gaming applications. The network‚Äôs ability to manage thousands of transactions per second makes it attractive for developers, but occasional outages have raised concerns about stability. Despite this, Solana continues to see growth, drawing attention from large firms and strengthening its place among the best long-term cryptos. 4. Chainlink: Bridging Data Between Blockchain & Reality Chainlink (LINK) plays a crucial role in connecting smart contracts with real-world data, serving as a key provider for multiple blockchains. One challenge is that Chainlink‚Äôs growth relies on how widely blockchain technology is used. If decentralized finance and smart contract usage slow down, it could affect LINK‚Äôs price. title: Web3Bay Investors Eye 6,430% ROI as Presale Hits $1M! Unraveling ENS Inflows & Stacks Bearish Pattern
body: The Stacks bearish pattern continues to impact the market. Recently, the $1.53 price level was broken, plunging STX by 62% from its peak value. Conversely, recent ENS whale influence shocked the market, with a substantial $9.15 million deposit leading to a 1041% increase in network inflows. For Web3Bay (3BAY) , early backers are poised for a 6,430% ROI at its debut, with the 3BAY token projected to jump from $0.003 to $0.1959. This leading web3 cryptocurrency aims to revolutionize the billion-dollar e-commerce industry by enhancing how buyers and sellers connect, and by providing token holders with governance and staking benefits. Stacks Bearish Pattern Indicates Potential Fall Stacks, the layer-2 solution for Bitcoin, has seen a 62% drop from its highest price of $3.86, now trading at $1.45. Although it had some recent price increases, the prevailing Stacks bearish pattern suggests more declines might follow. The token has developed a typical head and shoulders pattern‚Äîa bearish indicator suggesting a potential further decrease after breaking the critical $1.53 ‚Äúneckline.‚Äù Currently, this neckline has been crossed, setting $1 as the next crucial support level. Despite the challenges, optimism about Stacks‚Äô fundamental strengths remains, according to its founder, though the short-term forecast appears uncertain. ENS Whale Influence Triggers 1041% Jump In Inflows A significant move by a whale, depositing 282,365 Ethereum Name Service (ENS) tokens worth $9.15 million into Binance, caused a 1041% increase in ENS inflows within a day. title: Litecoin ETF Likely To Be Approved Before XRP, According to Bloomberg Strategist: Report
body: A Bloomberg analyst reportedly thinks that a Litecoin ( LTC ) exchange-traded fund (ETF) will likely secure regulatory approval ahead of a similar product for Ripple‚Äôs XRP . Fortune reports that on Thursday, asset manager Grayscale submitted a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to convert its $16.1 million XRP trust into an ETF. A number of other companies are also applying for new crypto ETFs, including those for Litecoin, Solana ( SOL ) and Dogecoin ( DOGE ), as the US enters a pro-crypto era under the Trump administration. Last month, Ripple president Monica Long said that the next crypto ETF to receive a greenlight after Bitcoin ( BTC ) and Ethereum ( ETH ) will likely be XRP, but Bloomberg analyst James Seyffart is not as optimistic. Seyffart says the SEC is still claiming that XRP is a security, a roadblock that might bar ETFs based on the third-largest crypto asset from getting the seal of approval. He also notes that XRP-issuer Ripple is still locked in a legal tussle with the SEC. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs some more work that needs to be done on that front that doesn‚Äôt need to happen with something like Litecoin. The SEC has never called Litecoin a security so, I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if you see Litecoin come first.‚Äù While Seyffart does not see the imminent approval of XRP ETFs, he believes that it is within the realm of possibility for the third-largest crypto asset to get one this year. title: HIVE Digital Buys Bitfarms‚Äô Paraguay BTC Mine for $56M
body: HIVE Digital has finalized the acquisition of Bitfarms‚Äô partially completed 200-megawatt Bitcoin mining facility in Yguaz√∫, Paraguay, for $56 million. The deal includes an upfront payment of $25 million due at closing in the first quarter of 2025, with the remaining $31 million to be paid in six equal monthly installments. The $56 Million Purchase According to an announcement HIVE made on January 28, the Yguaz√∫ facility will be developed in two stages. Phase 1, which is already 80% finished, is scheduled for completion by April 1, 2025. Once operational in the second quarter, it is expected to add approximately six exahashes per second (EH/s) to HIVE‚Äôs Bitcoin mining capacity. Phase 2, expected to be wrapped up by August 31, 2025, will introduce hydro-cooled Bitmain S21+ ASICs, adding 6.5 EH/s. The Texas-based crypto miner has estimated the cost of completing the facility at $400,000 per MW. It also revealed that it will be funded using existing cash reserves and BTC holdings. As part of the acquisition, HIVE will assume $19 million in pre-existing power purchase agreement (PPA) deposits that Bitfarms paid to Paraguayan utility ANDE. This aligns with its goal of expanding its Bitcoin mining capacity to 25 EH/s by September 2025. As of December 2024, the firm reported a realized hashrate of 5.46 EH/s and held 2,805 BTC in its reserves. It has also pre-ordered 15 EH/s of hydro-cooled ASICs from Bitmain and Canaan to support its growth plans. Bitfarms‚Äô Strategic Shift The sale of the Yguaz√∫ facility marks a strategic shift for Bitfarms, which initially planned to develop the site as part of its 2024 expansion into Latin America. Construction delays led to the relocation of mining equipment originally intended for Paraguay to Stronghold Digital‚Äôs Pennsylvania facility as part of a 2024 merger. CEO Ben Gagnon stated that the proceeds from the sale would support the company‚Äôs 1-gigawatt growth pipeline in the U.S., which includes infrastructure for Bitcoin mining as well as high-performance computing and artificial intelligence. ‚ÄúWe are pleased to announce the sale of our Yguaz√∫ site to HIVE as we continue to streamline our operations and rebalance towards North America,‚Äù Gagnon said. Bitfarms remains committed to its operations in Latin America, where it has three other facilities with a total capacity of 144 MW and long-term power agreements. The latest development comes after a proposed merger with Riot Platforms Inc. in 2024, which would have created 15 facilities in several areas, including Paraguay. However, Bitfarms‚Äô board ultimately rejected the plan, with the two companies terminating the acquisition bid. The post HIVE Digital Buys Bitfarms‚Äô Paraguay BTC Mine for $56M appeared first on CryptoPotato .

body: Forex News Today: Live Market Trends & Key Developments The forex market is experiencing significant fluctuations as global economic conditions continue to evolve. Traders and investors are closely watching central bank policies, interest rate decisions, and geopolitical developments to make informed trading decisions. With forex news live updates, traders gain real-time insights into major currency pairs, economic indicators, and financial policies shaping market trends. Let‚Äôs dive into the latest news forex updates impacting global forex markets today. Major Forex Market Movements USD Performance Amid Federal Reserve Policies The US dollar (USD) remains a focal point as traders assess the Federal Reserve‚Äôs stance on interest rates. Recent economic reports suggest a mixed outlook, with inflationary pressures persisting while job market stability supports a potential rate pause. EUR/USD: The euro is facing downward pressure as the European Central Bank (ECB) hints at prolonged monetary tightening. GBP/USD: The British pound is seeing volatility as economic uncertainty and inflation concerns remain. USD/JPY: The yen continues to weaken as Japan maintains an ultra-loose monetary policy. Key Forex News Live Updates 1. European Markets React to ECB‚Äôs Policy Decision The ECB has maintained its cautious stance, signaling a potential slowdown in rate hikes amid economic uncertainty. This has caused fluctuations in EUR/USD , with traders awaiting further guidance on inflation control measures. 2. Federal Reserve Signals Economic Caution In the latest forex news , the Federal Reserve has hinted at a measured approach toward future rate hikes. With inflation showing signs of resilience, traders anticipate a data-driven decision in the next policy meeting. 3. Bank of Japan‚Äôs Dovish Stance Pressures the Yen The Japanese yen has weakened further as the Bank of Japan (BoJ) remains committed to its ultra-loose monetary policy. The forex news live market reaction has seen USD/JPY climb as investors seek higher yields in other currencies. 4. title: US Forex Market Update: US30 Forex Trends & Key Insights
body: US Forex Market: Key Updates & Trading Insights The US forex market remains one of the most influential financial markets globally, attracting traders looking to capitalize on the volatility of major currency pairs and stock indices like US30 forex . With the US economy playing a central role in global finance, traders closely monitor economic indicators, Federal Reserve policies, and market sentiment to make informed trading decisions. In this article, we‚Äôll explore the latest updates on US forex , including the performance of the US30 forex index, key economic events, and strategies for traders navigating the US financial markets. US Forex Market Overview The US forex market is dominated by the US dollar (USD), the world‚Äôs primary reserve currency. Factors influencing the USD include: Federal Reserve Policies: Interest rate decisions significantly impact USD strength. US Economic Data: Inflation reports, employment data, and GDP growth affect market sentiment. Geopolitical Events: Trade policies and international relations influence USD demand. The US forex market operates 24 hours a day, with peak trading activity occurring during the New York session. Major USD currency pairs, including EUR/USD , GBP/USD , and USD/JPY , experience heightened volatility during this time. US30 Forex: Dow Jones Index & Forex Correlation The US30 forex , also known as the Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA), is a major stock market index representing 30 of the largest US companies. It is closely tied to forex market movements due to its correlation with investor sentiment and USD strength. US30 Forex Key Influencers Federal Reserve Decisions ‚Äì Interest rate hikes or cuts impact equity markets, influencing US30 forex volatility. Economic Reports ‚Äì Strong employment and GDP growth support stock market rallies, while weak data triggers declines. Corporate Earnings ‚Äì Positive earnings reports push US30 higher, whereas disappointing results lead to sell-offs. Geopolitical Risks ‚Äì Political instability can cause sudden fluctuations in the US forex market. When risk appetite is high, the US30 forex index tends to rise, often leading to USD depreciation. Conversely, during economic uncertainty, the USD strengthens as investors seek safe-haven assets. Latest US Forex & US30 Forex News 1. Federal Reserve‚Äôs Interest Rate Outlook The Fed‚Äôs latest stance on interest rates remains a key driver of US forex movements. Markets anticipate a cautious approach, with inflation data being the primary factor determining future rate decisions. 2. Stock Market Volatility & US30 Forex Trends The US30 forex index is experiencing fluctuations amid corporate earnings reports and concerns over economic growth. Traders are closely monitoring support and resistance levels for potential breakout opportunities. 3. US Dollar Strength Amid Economic Uncertainty Despite recent stock market gains, the USD remains strong due to global uncertainty and demand for safe-haven assets. This is impacting currency pairs such as EUR/USD and GBP/USD . Trading Strategies for US Forex & US30 Forex US Forex Trading Strategies Trend Trading: Identify long-term trends using moving averages and RSI indicators. News Trading: React to economic reports and Fed decisions for short-term volatility trades. Breakout Trading: Use key support and resistance levels to capitalize on market movements. US30 Forex Trading Strategies Momentum Trading: Enter trades based on strong price action movements. Risk Management: Use stop-loss orders to protect against sudden market swings. Correlation Analysis: Monitor USD strength to anticipate US30 forex movements. Conclusion The US forex market remains highly dynamic, with US30 forex movements providing traders with valuable opportunities. As the Federal Reserve shapes monetary policy and economic indicators influence investor sentiment, traders must stay informed to navigate market volatility effectively. For real-time updates on US forex and US30 forex , continue following our latest market insights. title: Bitcoin Tumbles 8% to $93K With Billions Liquidated as Asia Awakens to Trump's Trade War
body: Major cryptocurrency including bitcoin (BTC), ether (ETH), Solana's SOL, and XRP were all significantly down as Asia began its trading week. By mid-morning Hong Kong time, BTC was down 8%, trading above $93,100, according to CoinDesk Indices data . Meanwhile, ether (ETH) is down nearly 20% , trading at $2,500, while SOL is down 13% at $184 . XRP is down 28% and trading at $2 . The CoinDesk 20 (CD20) , an index of the largest digital assets, is down nearly 17%. Trump's memecoin (TRUMP) is down 12%. Data from CoinGlass shows that over the last 12 hours nearly $1.3 billion in long positions have been liquidated, with around $400 million in long ether positions and $300 million in long BTC positions. The market correction stems from a trade war that has seemingly been ignited by U.S. President Donald Trump with 25% tariffs being placed on Canada and Mexico. Many market observers are skeptical about the benefits of tariffs, with a Wall Street Journal editorial board op-ed calling it the "Dumbest Trade War in History" over the weekend. Brussels said that the European Union would respond firmly to any tariffs imposed on its member states. ‚ÄúTariffs create unnecessary economic disruption and drive inflation. They are hurtful to all sides,‚Äù Politico quoted a spokesperson as saying . The U.K. seems to be the only nation that's able to get a reprieve from tariffs, with Trump saying a deal can be "worked out" according to the BBC . Trump, for his part, dismissed criticism, in a series of posts on Truth Social over the weekend , suggesting that critics were being funded by China.

title: Forex Funding Revolution: How Funded Forex Programs Are Changing the Game
body: Forex Funding: A Game-Changer for Aspiring Traders The forex funding industry has witnessed significant growth, offering traders access to substantial capital without risking their own money. Programs such as True Forex Funds , Infinity Forex Funds , and My Forex Funds are leading the charge, revolutionizing the way traders engage with the foreign exchange market. With proprietary trading firms providing funded accounts, traders now have the chance to scale their strategies and maximize profits while minimizing financial risk. The concept of funded forex accounts is no longer a luxury but a necessity for those who want to make a mark in the forex industry. What Is Forex Funding? Forex funding allows traders to access capital from proprietary trading firms, eliminating the need for significant personal investment. These firms evaluate traders through a qualification process, typically involving a demo trading challenge where traders must demonstrate their skills in a risk-controlled environment. Once traders pass the evaluation, they receive a funded forex account, enabling them to trade with the firm‚Äôs capital and earn a profit share. Programs like The Forex Funder and My Funded Forex have gained popularity due to their structured evaluations and fair trading conditions. How True Forex Funds and Infinity Forex Funds Are Leading the Market Among the many proprietary trading firms, True Forex Funds and Infinity Forex Funds stand out for their transparent evaluation processes and trader-friendly conditions. True Forex Funds Offers a structured evaluation with realistic profit targets. Provides traders with up to 90% profit splits. Allows diverse trading styles, including scalping, swing trading, and day trading. Infinity Forex Funds Focuses on giving traders a seamless funding experience. Offers competitive trading conditions with minimal restrictions. Enables traders to withdraw profits quickly and efficiently. Both firms empower traders by giving them the opportunity to grow their capital without financial constraints. The Rise of Forex Funder and My Forex Funds Programs such as Forex Funder and My Forex Funds have gained traction due to their trader-friendly funding models. Forex Funder provides traders with flexible trading options, allowing them to use expert advisors (EAs) and leverage different trading strategies. My Forex Funds offers various funding models, including rapid funding options where traders can skip the evaluation phase. These firms have democratized forex trading, ensuring that skilled traders can access capital regardless of their financial background. Why Funded Forex Accounts Are Changing the Industry The traditional forex trading landscape required traders to risk their own capital, often leading to significant financial losses. However, funded forex accounts have eliminated this barrier, offering several advantages: Risk-Free Trading: Traders use firm capital, protecting their personal funds. Higher Profit Potential: Large capital access allows traders to maximize gains. No Personal Losses: Any losses incurred are covered by the funding firm. Scalability: Successful traders can receive increased capital allocations over time. The emergence of fast forex funding options has further accelerated industry growth, enabling traders to receive funding within days instead of weeks. Forex Fundamental Analysis: A Key to Success Even with a funded forex account, traders must rely on forex fundamental analysis to make informed decisions. Understanding macroeconomic indicators, interest rates, and geopolitical events is crucial for sustained profitability. Key Aspects of Fundamental Analysis Forex Traders Should Know Interest Rates: Higher interest rates typically strengthen a currency, while lower rates weaken it. Inflation Reports: High inflation can erode currency value, impacting forex movements. Employment Data: Strong job reports can boost a currency, while weak reports can cause depreciation. Geopolitical Events: Political instability can lead to market volatility. By mastering fundamental analysis forex traders can enhance their decision-making and improve their performance with funded forex accounts. Is Fast Forex Funding the Future? The concept of fast forex funding is gaining momentum, as traders seek quicker access to capital. Firms are now offering instant funding models, reducing the wait time for traders to start trading live accounts. Advantages of Fast Forex Funding Immediate access to trading capital. No lengthy evaluation processes. Quick profit withdrawals. Flexible trading conditions. As technology advances, fast forex funding is expected to become the norm, further enhancing the efficiency and accessibility of proprietary trading firms. Conclusion The evolution of forex funding has created a new era of opportunities for traders. Programs such as True Forex Funds , Infinity Forex Funds , The Forex Funder , and My Forex Funds have redefined the forex landscape, providing traders with the capital they need to succeed. With a focus on risk-free trading, higher profit potential, and the integration of forex fundamental analysis , the funded forex industry is set to continue its rapid growth. As more firms offer fast forex funding , traders can look forward to even greater financial freedom and career opportunities in the forex market. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on latest news , where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

However, recent network instability and centralization concerns have raised red flags for investors seeking long-term stability. Biggest Weakness of Solana ‚Äì Network Failures & Centralization Solana‚Äôs biggest issue has always been its reliability. Despite its impressive speed, the network has experienced frequent outages, with over a dozen incidents causing disruptions that sometimes last hours or even days. These downtimes, especially during periods of high demand, have hurt user trust and raised questions about the network‚Äôs long-term stability. Another major concern is Solana‚Äôs over-reliance on centralized validators. A significant portion of staking power is concentrated among a few entities, leading to criticisms about its lack of true decentralization. This centralization undermines the core principles of blockchain technology and poses risks for network security. Finally, Solana faces congestion issues during peak usage. While designed for high throughput, its single-layer structure creates bottlenecks, limiting efficiency. For investors prioritizing scalability and reliability, Solana‚Äôs challenges make alternatives like Lightchain AI on Polygon a safer long-term option. Why Lightchain AI on Polygon Is the Better Investment As Solana grapples with instability, Lightchain AI is stepping ahead by leveraging Polygon‚Äôs reliable Layer-2 infrastructure to deliver a faster, more scalable, and AI-integrated blockchain experience. Unlike Solana, Polygon‚Äôs Layer-2 solutions process transactions off-chain while still benefiting from Ethereum‚Äôs robust security, ensuring no network outages. Lightchain AI isn‚Äôt just another blockchain project‚Äîit‚Äôs pioneering the integration of artificial intelligence to enhance data processing, smart contracts, and decentralized applications (dApps). This unique combination of AI and blockchain gives it a technological edge over both Solana and Polygon, promising greater efficiency and innovation for the future. title: Key Levels to Watch as Bitcoin Price Crashes Below $100K Today
body: Bitcoin (BTC) price traded as low as $91,231 on Binance on Monday Morning, as crypto markets buckle under pressure from escalating trade tariff war involving the United States. Bitcoin (BTC) Plummets to $91K as Crypto Market Liquidations Hit $1.8 Billion Bitcoin (BTC) plunged below the $91,200 mark on February 3, its lowest level in 20 days. This decline follows mounting economic concerns sparked by former U.S. President Donald Trump‚Äôs aggressive trade tariffs on China, Mexico, and Canada, which have triggered widespread financial market turbulence. As fears of rising consumer prices escalate, social media reports suggest that American consumers are preparing for inflation by stockpiling essential goods. This has led to a shift in retail investor sentiment, with many liquidating riskier assets such as stocks and cryptocurrencies in favor of more stable stores of value. Crypto Market Liquidations, Feb 3, 2025 | Source: Coinglass.com As depicted above, Crypto market liquidations have exceeded $1.8 billion as BTC price plunged 7% in the last 24 hours, signaling unusually heavy capitulation from large investors. This suggests that Bitcoin institutional investors are also responding to inflation risks, anticipating that the U.S. Federal Reserve may be forced to raise interest rates sooner than expected. This has led many to shift capital toward government bonds before interest rate hikes push prices higher. Combined, these factors have exacerbated selling pressure in the crypto market, driving Bitcoin‚Äôs price down by 11% over the past three days. Key Bitcoin (BTC) Price Levels to Watch Amid the ongoing crypto market downturn, some crucial BTC trading signals indicate key levels that could be pivotal to Bitcoin price action as the week progresses. Coinglass Liquidation Map Shows BTC‚Äôs Strongest Support Level Lies at $90,360 Bitcoin started the week under pressure due to the bearish sentiment surrounding the escalating trade war. Many U.S.-based traders likely set sell orders over the weekend, anticipating further downward movement as markets opened on Monday. This could result in heightened volatility in the early trading hours. Coinglass‚Äô liquidation map provides insight into the critical price levels where traders have placed leveraged positions. The chart displays Bitcoin‚Äôs aggregated leverage positions over the last 30 days, revealing key areas where liquidation events are likely. Bitcoin (BTC) Liquidation Map | Source: Coinglass The data suggests that bearish sentiment dominates, with $11.9 billion in short positions far exceeding the $3.04 billion in long positions. This confirms expectations of further downside risk. However, bullish traders have concentrated $2.12 billion in leverage at the $90,358 level, accounting for 70% of total long leverage positions. This indicates strong potential support around $90,500, as traders seek to defend their positions from liquidation losses. Other key support zones include $93,000 and $94,330, where long positions total $1 billion and $330 million, respectively. If Bitcoin‚Äôs price approaches these levels, we could see increased buying activity aimed at stabilizing the market. Nevertheless, a prolonged bearish trend could persist unless global economic conditions improve or influential market participants intervene to stabilize sentiment. The Double-Bottom Pattern Signals a Potential Breakout Toward $108,000 While the prevailing market sentiment remains bearish due to macroeconomic pressures, certain technical indicators suggest the possibility of a Bitcoin price recovery. The double-bottom pattern observed in recent trading activity hints at a potential breakout target of $108,000, provided market sentiment shifts positively. Savvy investors might capitalize on the current price dip, increasing their Bitcoin holdings around the $90,300, $93,000, and $94,300 support levels. Some Bitcoin maximalists believe that prolonged trade tensions could drive sovereign entities to seek BTC as an inflation hedge. Notably, the Czech Republic and Bhutan have recently explored Bitcoin acquisitions, and U.S. states and corporations may increasingly turn to blockchain solutions to circumvent trade barriers. Bitcoin Price Forecast: Can BTC Rebound to $108K? From a technical analysis standpoint, Bitcoin price forecast shows BTC trading near recent significant lows highlighted double-bottom pattern, which often precedes a bullish breakout. In terms of key levels to watch, BTC must maintains support above $90,500 to keep alive rebound hopes of reclaiming the $96,150 territory. If the trade war sparks a BTC buying frenzy among nations and institutions, the ensuing BTC price recovery could gain enough momentum to test the $102,000-$105,000 range. A sustained rally above these levels could open the door to the $108,000 breakout target. Key Bitcoin (BTC) Price Levels to Watch: BTC/USD | TradingView The Bollinger Bands indicator also highlights key resistance levels that Bitcoin must overcome to reclaim bullish momentum. The upper band suggests significant resistance at $105,800, followed by a more substantial barrier near $108,000. If Bitcoin can consolidate above these levels, it may establish a new bullish trend, counteracting the recent downturn. In Summary: While Bitcoin‚Äôs 11% decline in 3 consecutive losing days has rattled investors with $1.8 billion market liquidations. However, key technical indicators point to potential support around $90,500 and possible recovery scenarios. The ongoing trade war and economic uncertainty continue to influence market sentiment, but long-term investors and institutional players could take advantage of lower prices. Should positive sentiment return, Bitcoin could break out toward $108,000, reinforcing its status as a politically-neutral asset. title: Bitcoin falls to $92k, US stock market crashes as Trump vows to escalate tariffs
body: Bitcoin tanked. It hit $92,681 less than an hour ago before bouncing slightly to $93,831. That‚Äôs a 7% drop. Ether wasn‚Äôt spared either, crashing 20% to its lowest point since November. The market meltdown began after President Donald Trump threw his trade-war punch Saturday night. He slapped Canada and Mexico with a 25% tariff and hit China with a 10% duty. The tariffs are set to officially kick in on Tuesday, and the ‚Äòcrypto president‚Äô has declared that the tariffs ‚Äúcould get a lot worse‚Äù than they are right now. The CoinDesk 20 index, which tracks the biggest 20 crypto by market value, has tumbled by 19% in the past 8 hours. Stocks didn‚Äôt sit this one out either. Dow futures fell 463 points. S&P 500 futures lost 1.6%, while Nasdaq-100 futures dropped 2.1%. Investors got hit everywhere, and crypto traders are now eyeing key support at $90,000 for Bitcoin, with fears of another pullback to $80,000 if it crashes below that level. Trump‚Äôs tariffs cause fear across markets Per data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics, the US does $1.6 trillion in annual trade with Canada, Mexico, and China, so these tariffs hit a nerve. Stock traders are sweating. Over 120 major companies in the S&P 500, including Alphabet, Amazon, Walt Disney, and Palantir, are set to report their earnings this week. Nobody wants disappointing numbers, but the tariffs have raised that risk. AI stocks, already under scrutiny, are taking this the hardest. Nvidia‚Äôs NVDA has lost over 7% of its value. 1. Super Micro‚Äôs SMCI plunged by 8.8%, AMD tumbled by 5.1%, and Arm‚Äôs ARM lost 6.2%. The Dow, S&P 500, and Nasdaq ended last week in the red. But surprisingly, they still closed January with gains‚Äî2.7% for the S&P 500 and 4.7% for the Dow. Bitcoin is down 16% from its January high of $109,350. That‚Äôs a $16,000 haircut in a matter of days. Experienced crypto traders aren‚Äôt surprised though. Bitcoin has a history of corrections, often around 30%, even during bull runs. Arthur Hayes, founder of BitMEX who has been trading Bitcoin since 2011, thinks Bitcoin will benefit in the long term, because a trade war would weaken the US dollar. But the dollar isn‚Äôt having a tough time right now though, as it surges by over 1% today, continuing its climb to five-year highs. Friday‚Äôs nonfarm payrolls report will add more drama. Economists expect 175,000 new jobs for January, with unemployment sticking at 4.1%. If the numbers come in worse than expected, it could fuel more uncertainty. And guess what? Uncertainty is poison for Bitcoin right now. But according to Trump ? ‚ÄúAnybody that‚Äôs against Tariffs, including the Fake News Wall Street Journal, and Hedge Funds, is only against them because these people or entities are controlled by China, or other foreign or domestic companies. Anybody that loves and believes in the United States of America is in favor of Tariffs. They should have never ended, in favor of the Income Tax System, in 1913. The response to Tariffs has been FANTASTIC!‚Äù Cryptopolitan Academy: Are You Making These Web3 Resume Mistakes? - Find Out Here

title: Bitcoin and altcoins crash after Trump‚Äôs tariff announcements spook investors
body: After President Donald Trump targeted China, Mexico, and Canada with long-threatened import taxes, the crypto market fell on Feb. 1 in a risk-off action. Bitcoin‚Äôs price fell by 5%, which has rippled its way into altcoins. Effective Feb. 1, the U.S. will impose tariffs of 25% on imports from Canada and Mexico and 10% on Chinese goods, adding further complexity to the current trade wars. As a result, over the past 24 hours ending on Feb. 3, Bitcoin ( BTC ) has experienced a notable decline amid a market-wide sell-off. The cryptocurrency fell by over 5%, reaching a low of approximately $91,200 before rebounding to around $94,000 as of this writing. Despite this recovery, BTC remains roughly 13% below its all-time high of $109,000, and trading volume has surged by more than 200%, suggesting considerable selling pressure or market panic. Additionally, the overall global crypto market cap has dropped nearly 12% during the same period, settling at about $3.15 trillion. It‚Äôs worth noting that following President Donald Trump‚Äôs inauguration on Jan. 20, Bitcoin and other altcoins saw a significant price increase. However, since that peak, recent developments‚Äîincluding new tariff policies‚Äîhave contributed to a drastic decline in market sentiment and asset values. Given Bitcoin‚Äôs recent price crash, it has had a cascading effect on altcoins. In the last 24 hours, Ethereum ( ETH ) has fallen by nearly 20%, Ripple ( XRP ) by 22%, Solana ( SOL ) by 8%, and Binance Coin ( BNB ) by over 15%. You might also like: Trump family gave us a ‚Äòmasterclass‚Äô in meme marketing‚Äô: pro Bitcoin Long Term Holder SOPR: A correlation between declining SOPR and Bitcoin‚Äôs price dip YTD, reflecting market volatility and long-term holder behavior. Source: CryptoQuant by crypto.news You might also like: Big money is moving: Agent A.I., AI16Z, and TRUMP gain attention Rising trading volume alongside price dips often signals strong selling pressure or market panic, as more traders offload their assets. This pattern suggests that long-term investors are now selling their coins at lower profits than their purchase price‚Äîor even at a loss year-to-date‚Äîas illustrated by the Bitcoin: Long Term Holder SOPR chart. Such behavior often indicates capitulation among long-term holders, a phenomenon common during bearish market trends and corrections. Experts, including BitMEX CEO Arthur Hayes, have even warned that a ‚Äúfinancial crisis‚Äù may be on the horizon. 60% of American plebes don‚Äôt have $1k of emergency funds. The Fed is ‚Äúworried‚Äù about inflation. So Trump decides to hike energy prices via tariffs? He ain‚Äôt a fool, maybe he is trying to trigger a mini financial crisis? It‚Äôs def in the maybe column. pic.twitter.com/VEiI9qZZqC ‚Äî Arthur Hayes (@CryptoHayes) February 2, 2025 Read more: Are Trump tariffs crashing crypto? title: President Trump says the Fed was right to stop cutting interest rates
body: President Donald Trump stunned reporters on Sunday night when he praised the Federal Reserve‚Äôs decision to hit pause on its rate cuts. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not surprised,‚Äù he said as he arrived in Washington aboard Air Force One. ‚ÄúHolding the rates at this point was the right thing to do.‚Äù Now this is a complete 180 for a man who spent much of the past year relentlessly demanding that the Fed cut rates immediately. During his second day back in office, Trump flatout said he was gonna force chair Jerome Powell into cutting rates one way or another. Ignoring him as per usual, the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) last week voted unanimously to hold the federal funds rate between 4.25% and 4.5%. The decision came amid fears that inflation could spike again, driven by Trump‚Äôs own economic policies, including the tariffs he just launched and of course the immigration crackdowns. Still, Mr. Trump continues to push his economic agenda. At the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, just days before the Fed‚Äôs decision, he told global leaders that the U.S. economy needed lower interest rates to stay competitive. ‚ÄúIf I disagree [with the Fed‚Äôs decision], I will let it be known,‚Äù he told reporters from the Oval on Thursday, targeting Fed Chair Jerome Powell directly, who by the way said he had absolutely no comments about the president at his post-minutes press conference, as Cryptopolitan reported . Trump‚Äôs incoming trade wars keep pressure on inflation February 1st saw chaos as the S&P 500 hit an all-time high before investors began bracing for possible fallout from rising prices. The tariffs are creating bottlenecks and adding costs for companies that rely on foreign goods as well as innocent Americans, pushing inflation higher. Wall Street is so mad at Trump right now. Investors know that if inflation doesn‚Äôt cool soon, it will certainly block further growth. The personal consumption expenditures (PCE) price index, a key measure of inflation, jumped to 2.6% in December from 2.4% in November, according to the U.S. Commerce Department. Core PCE, which strips out food and energy costs, remained steady at 2.8%‚Äîstill above the Fed‚Äôs 2% target. The Fed‚Äôs rate cut pause is meant to give policymakers time to see if inflation finally starts declining. Powell holds his ground anyway Powell, who has been a consistent target of Trump‚Äôs public outlash, made it clear that the central bank won‚Äôt base its decisions on political interference. The Fed cut rates three times in late 2024 when they saw it fit to, and are now holding because they see it fit to, according to chair Powell. But Trump believes that: ‚ÄúI think I know interest rates much better than they do.‚Äù Trump even said during his campaign in August that the president should have a direct say in monetary policy. While this idea has been dismissed by economists and even his own people as risky, Trump continues to hint at changes that could give him more influence over the Fed‚Äôs decisions. Asked whether he believed Powell would listen to him, Trump snickered before giving a condescending ‚ÄúYeah.‚Äù The confidence is typical of Trump, but Powell‚Äôs past actions suggest otherwise. The Fed chief has resisted political pressure before, and he‚Äôs doing it again, with no fear at all. But despite their differences, Powell and Trump do agree on one thing: the need for a stable U.S. economy. But their approaches couldn‚Äôt be more different. Trump wants rapid rate cuts to keep borrowing cheap and markets booming. Powell, on the other hand, is focused on keeping inflation under control without triggering a recession. The January pause could be temporary. If inflation shows signs of cooling, the Fed might consider more rate cuts later this year. But for now, Powell is playing it safe, and Trump‚Äîin spite of himself‚Äîseems to be on board. Cryptopolitan Academy: How to Write a Web3 Resume That Lands Interviews - FREE Cheat Sheet

title: Solana‚Äôs Retail Surge Driven by Pump.fun, Ethereum Still King of Large Trade
body: Solana is currently dominating the retail decentralized exchange (DEX) market and accounts for 48% of total DEX volume. In fact, nearly 60% of this activity is driven by the popular Solana-based meme coin platform pump.fun transactions, according to OKX‚Äôs recent report shared with CryptoPotato . Solana vs. Ethereum While Solana leads in overall transaction volume, Ethereum and its Layer 2 networks maintain a stronghold on high-value trades, particularly those exceeding $50,000. In terms of liquidity pool quality, Ethereum continues to lead, holding 10 of the top 20 positions, followed by Base with five, Arbitrum and Binance Smart Chain (BSC) with two each, and Solana securing just one spot. This data from the crypto exchange highlighted Solana‚Äôs strength in retail trading, even as Ethereum remains the preferred choice for large-value transactions and deep liquidity pools. Commenting on the report‚Äôs findings, OKX Chief Innovation Officer Jason Lau said, ‚ÄúDecentralized Exchanges are the lifeblood of the onchain economy, embodying the core ethos of crypto through their permissionless, self-custodial, and community-driven nature. Our findings reveal how the DEX landscape has grown ‚Äì with activity recently hitting all-time highs.‚Äù Decentralized derivatives are gaining traction as platforms like Hyperliquid and dYdX introduce appchain innovations aimed at achieving centralized exchange-level performance. Although spot trading volumes on decentralized exchanges still surpass derivatives trading by a factor of 10, these advancements highlight a significant shift in the market. At the same time, traditional finance (TradFi) yield instruments are making their way into DeFi, with tokenized Treasury Bills (T-Bills) and basis trading assets like USDe and USR emerging as yield-bearing base currencies. This development, according to OKX, is ‚Äúfundamentally changing‚Äù the derivatives landscape by offering new opportunities for traders and ramping up capital efficiency in DeFi markets. Asia Leads in Developer Wars From the demographic front, Asia is emerging as the leading hub for blockchain development and has even surpassed Europe and North America, with 32% of the industry‚Äôs developers based in the region. OKX found that builder preferences indicate Ethereum as the dominant platform, attracting 20.8% of developers. Next up was Solana, capturing 11.2%, and Base, with 10.7% of developers. Additionally, artificial intelligence (AI) integration has become a major focus and accounted for almost 34% of developer activity. As a result, it has outpaced other sectors, such as blockchain infrastructure and decentralized finance, which accounted for 20.1% and 14.2%, respectively. The post Solana‚Äôs Retail Surge Driven by Pump.fun, Ethereum Still King of Large Trade appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Crypto News: Japan‚Äôs Finance Minister Promises Major Changes to Crypto Tax by June 2025
body: The post Crypto News: Japan‚Äôs Finance Minister Promises Major Changes to Crypto Tax by June 2025 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Japan‚Äôs Finance Minister, Katsunobu Kato, announced that the government will review the nation‚Äôs crypto tax laws by the end of June 2025. This comes in response to growing concerns about Japan‚Äôs existing tax regulations for crypto traders. According to Iolite , Kato made the announcement during a plenary session of the House of Representatives on January 31, 2025. He explained that the Financial Services Agency (FSA) would lead the review, with proposals from the ruling Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) on potential changes to the tax system. The review is expected to include recommendations for necessary legislative amendments. ‚ÄúWe are discussing the matter in line with the 2025 Tax Reform Outline, and are considering the necessary legal arrangements. The Financial Services Agency will verify the system regarding crypto assets by June of this year,‚Äù he said. Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba, also weighed in on the matter, stressing the importance of the healthy development of Web 3.0 technologies, including cryptocurrencies. Ishiba said that crypto assets have the potential to address some of Japan‚Äôs social issues and improve productivity. He also opened up about the need for the government to ensure user protection and improve the environment for domestic crypto markets. Challenges with Japan‚Äôs Current Crypto Tax Laws Currently, Japan‚Äôs tax system requires crypto traders to report their trading profits as part of their annual income tax returns, leading to some high tax rates. Critics of the tax system argue that these high tax burdens have stifled the growth of the crypto sector in Japan. The Finance Ministry and FSA are also considering amending the Payment Services Act to include crypto as an asset class under the Financial Instruments and Exchange Act. This could mark a shift in how cryptocurrencies are regulated and taxed in Japan, aligning with international standards.

title: South Korea‚Äôs ‚Äòbitcoin kimchi‚Äô premium index rises by 9.7%
body: South Korea‚Äôs bitcoin premium index, aka ‚Äúkimchi premium,‚Äù reached a 10-month high on South Korean exchanges and remained stable amid a major global market dip. On Monday morning in Asia, the Korea Premium Index rose to 9.7%, marking its highest since April 14, 2024. According to CryptoQuant data , the premium is down to 8.2% at press time. The ‚Äúkimchi premium‚Äù refers to a price gap between the South Korean exchanges and foreign markets. It may indicate a stronger buying pressure among Korean retail investors. While Bitcoin‚Äôs price is tanking below $92k and Ethereum is down 20%, the Korea Premium Index is up as the South Korean market is difficult for foreign investors to enter. Bitcoin: Korea Premium Index (Source: CryptoQuant) According to a report by The Block, an analyst at Presto Research, Min Jung, said, ‚ÄúThe Kimchi Premium typically rises in bull markets when Korean investors bid higher, but it can also spike during periods of panic selling.‚Äù Jung predicted the kimchi premium would remain elevated so long as American investors maintained their selling activities. He added ‚ÄúHowever, historically, the Kimchi Premium has averaged around 5%. If the market stabilizes and rebounds, we would likely see the premium narrow back toward that level.‚Äù Cryptopolitan Academy: Are You Making These Web3 Resume Mistakes? - Find Out Here

title: Crypto Market Today Feb 3: BTC Slumps To $91K,¬†ETH & Meme Coins Crash 20%
body: The global crypto market witnessed turmoil as the week kicked off, primarily in the wake of U.S. President Donald Trump‚Äôs new tariffs rattling broader markets. Bitcoin (BTC) price crashed as low as the $91K level on Monday, whereas altcoin prices dipped in sync. Simultaneously, the cryptocurrency sector recorded massive liquidations, underscoring investor uncertainty amid the rising heat of global trade wars. Here‚Äôs a brief report on the most buzzworthy cryptocurrency market updates on February 3. Crypto Market Slumps Amid Trade War Speculations With Trump‚Äôs New Tariffs Following Donald Trump‚Äôs new import tariffs on Canada, Mexico, and China, global markets witnessed shockwaves as speculations of trade wars persist. In light of this saga, BTC & Altcoins showcased an alarmingly slumping action. Notably, ETH & leading meme coins lost roughly 20% value in the past 24 hours. Further, the global cryptocurrency market cap dropped nearly 9.5% in value to $3.04 trillion over the past day. However, amid rising liquidations and selloffs, the total market volume rose by 182% to $286.91 billion. title: Shiba Inu Price Analysis: 4.3 Trillion SHIB Tokens on the Move ‚Äì Are Memecoin Whales Buying the Dip?
body: Shiba Inu price has plunged below the $0.000015 mark on Feb 3, for the first time in 5 months, dating back to September 2024. On-chain data suggests whale investors are buying the dip. How could SHIB price react in the week ahead? Shiba Inu Price Plunges 30% amid Weekend Sell-off Shiba Inu (SHIB) price stabilized at $0.000014 on Monday, February 2, following a sharp 32% decline over the weekend. This marks SHIB‚Äôs lowest price in five months, dating back to September 2024. The sudden downturn comes amid broader market instability fueled by the latest trade war developments involving Trump-led tariffs on China, Mexico, and Canada . Macroeconomic concerns have triggered a wave of risk-off sentiment, prompting investors to offload speculative assets, particularly low-liquidity altcoins like SHIB. Social media reports suggest that U.S. consumers are preparing for inflation-driven price hikes. In response, investors appear to be shifting capital away from volatile memecoins in favor of more stable assets. Shiba Inu price action, Feb 3, 2025 | Source: TradingView Interestingly, SHIB price has been hit harder than other major altcoins , with its 30% decline surpassing losses seen in Solana (SOL), Chainlink (LINK), and Avalanche (AVAX), which remained under 20%. This suggests that SHIB‚Äôs downturn is not solely tied to macroeconomic events but rather a result of multiple pre-existing bearish catalysts that were already weighing on the token before the latest market-wide sell-off. Whales Back in Action as Large Transactions Jump to 4.3 Trillion While the market sentiment remains overwhelmingly bearish, whale investors appear to be making strategic moves amid the dip. One key indicator pointing to this is the sharp increase in Large Transactions, a metric tracked by blockchain data analytics platform, IntoTheBlock , monitoring transfers from wallets holding at least 0.1% of SHIB‚Äôs total circulating supply. These transactions often serve as a proxy for spotting odd whale activity, as large holders react to significant market events. Shiba Inu Large Transactions vs. SHIB price | IntoTheBlock As shown in the chart, SHIB‚Äôs Large Transactions volume stood at just 1.5 trillion on January 31. However, as SHIB‚Äôs price plummeted 32% over the weekend, this figure surged to 4.3 trillion SHIB by the end of February 2. This nearly 200% increase in whale transaction volume suggests that institutional and large-scale investors may be capitalizing on the price dip to accumulate more SHIB at lower prices. Historically, spikes in whale accumulation during price crashes have acted as a stabilizing factor for SHIB, as these high-volume transactions absorb excess selling pressure. If this trend continues, we could see SHIB‚Äôs price finding support around the $0.000014 level, preventing further declines. Shiba Inu Price Forecast: $0.000010 breakdown signals emerge despite whale Support Shiba Inu has been one of the biggest losers in the current market correction, with a 32% weekend decline bringing its price to a five-month low. While macroeconomic fears and retail capitulation have contributed to the sell-off, whale investors have significantly increased their accumulation, signaling potential price stabilization. In this bullish Shiba Inu price forecast scenario, Elliott Wave analysis suggests SHIB could be completing a corrective ABC pattern, with the latest drop marking the end of Wave C. This phase often precedes a new impulsive wave to the upside, particularly if whale accumulation sustains. The recent low near $0.000013 aligns with a major support zone, historically serving as a reversal point. If SHIB manages to reclaim $0.000015, bullish momentum could build, potentially driving a breakout toward $0.000018 in the short term. The MACD histogram, while still negative, is showing early signs of bearish momentum exhaustion, with the signal line curving upward. This suggests that selling pressure might be fading, and a bullish crossover could occur if SHIB stabilizes above key moving averages. Shiba Inu Price Forecast | SHIBUSD Nonetheless, SHIB remains vulnerable to further downside risks, particularly if U.S. trade tensions escalate further or broader crypto market sentiment deteriorates. Traders should closely monitor whale transaction trends and key support levels, such as $0.000014 and $0.000013, for potential signs of recovery or further breakdown. If the bearish narrative plays out, SHIB‚Äôs price action could extend losses below $0.000013, confirming a deeper Wave C breakdown. The 30% drop over the past two days signals a severe bearish impulse, and failure to hold $0.000012 could open the door for further declines toward $0.000010. The MACD‚Äôs negative trajectory and widening histogram bars reinforce the risk of continued selling pressure, suggesting weak demand despite whale accumulation. Moreover, a breach below $0.000010 would invalidate the potential for an immediate bullish reversal, exposing SHIB to a prolonged downtrend. In this case, traders should watch the $0.0000095 level as the last line of defense before capitulation accelerates. Without a steady inflow of new demand, SHIB could enter an extended consolidation phase. The post Shiba Inu Price Analysis: 4.3 Trillion SHIB Tokens on the Move ‚Äì Are Memecoin Whales Buying the Dip? appeared first on CoinGape .
